SEARCH

Package danogl.components.movement_schemes.movement_directing

package danogl.components.movement_schemes.movement_directing
The focus of this package is the MovementDirector class. The package also includes its subclasses and helper classes.
Author:
Dan Nirel
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    danogl.components.movement_schemes
    The public classes in the package are components that can be added to GameObjects in order to control their movement/direction according to various popular schemes.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommonMovementActions
    A collection of string-IDs for common movement instructions.
    KeyboardMovementDirector
    A MovementDirector that responds to keyboard input.
    MouseMovementDirector
    A MovementDirector that responds to mouse input.
    MovementDirector
    A movement director answers queries regarding movements an object should make.
